title: Increase logo size in header and update investigations count to 25+

requirements.summary: Increase the size of the Ghostbusters-style logo displayed in the header corner
acceptanceCriteria: Logo in the header corner is visibly larger than current size
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and does not overflow container
Logo size increase is responsive across mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Increase the size of the Ghostbusters-style logo (frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-ghostbusters-style.dim_400x400.png) in the header by modifying the width/height CSS classes or inline styles. Current implementation uses h-12 w-12 classes; increase to h-16 w-16 or similar for desktop and maintain proportional mobile sizing. Ensure the logo maintains aspect ratio and does not overflow its container.

requirements.summary: Update the investigations count statistics on the Home page to display '25+' instead of '50+'
acceptanceCriteria: Statistics section on Home page shows '25+' for investigations count
Text change is consistent across all instances where '50+' investigations was displayed
No other numerical statistics are affected by this change

file_operations.description: Update the investigations count text in the statistics section from '50+' to '25+'. Locate the statistics display area and change only the investigations count value. Verify that other statistics (team members, years of experience, etc.) remain unchanged.
